message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $175 is a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $155?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $155 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, but I'm willing to make another concession. How about we try $142.50?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $142.50 is still a bit high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $135.
I'm not willing to go as low as $135, but I'm willing to make another concession. How about we try $140?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $140 is still a bit high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $132.50.
I'm not willing to go as low as $132.50, but I'm willing to make another concession. How about we try $138?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I still think I can get a better deal. I was thinking more along the lines of $129.50.
